description: This file defines a React custom hook named useNotes that manages notes state, including fetching notes from an API, searching, filtering pinned notes, and CRUD operations such as creating, updating, deleting, and toggling pin status. It utilizes React hooks like useState, useEffect, useCallback, useMemo, and useRef to handle the component's internal state and side effects.

methods.name: useNotes()
methods.description: Main hook managing notes and related states, providing CRUD operations and search/filter functionalities within a React environment.
